name: AdminKickboard
0:
”Alexa, ask admin kickboard which teachers are using the most?”
”Alexa, ask admin kickboard who are the top students?”
”Alexa, ask admin kickboard what should I do today?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: admin kickboard
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Admin Kickboard skill for Amazon Alexa allows administrators to get real-time information about teachers and students that need to be positively recognized or may be in need of individual support. Teachers and administrators observe and then input student behaviors into the Kickboard platform. The real-time, dynamic information is available through Kickboard’s analysis tools and Alexa.

The Admin Kickboard skill allows school leaders to hear school-specific information on an Alexa enabled device by asking, “Alexa, ask admin kickboard how can I improve school culture?” Alexa will respond with information that describes the highest and lowest Kickboard teacher users according to the positivity ratio and the number of behaviors tracked. Also included in the response is the top student earners for the week, based on the total points or dollars the student has received in Kickboard and the students who have received the least number of points or dollars and may be in need of additional support.

Need help setting up or using the skill? Visit https://kickboard.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360038523652 for detailed instructions or to contact us at https://kickboard.zendesk.com/ for support.
